psqi1.Description: During the past month, when have you usually gone to bed at night?

psqi2.Description: During the past month, how long (in minutes) has it usually taken you to fall asleep each night?

psqi3.Description: During the past month, when have you usually gotten up in the morning?

psqi4.Description: During the past month, how many hours of actual sleep did you get at night? (This may be different than the number of hours you spend in bed.)

psqi5a.Description: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you cannot get to sleep within 30 minutes?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi5b.Description: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you wake up in the middle of the night or early morning?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi5c.Description: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you have to get up to use the bathroom?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi5d.Description: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you cannot breathe comfortably?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi5e.Description: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you cough or snore loudly?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi5f.Description: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you feel too cold?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi5g.Description: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you feel too hot?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi5h.Description: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you had bad dreams?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi5i.Description: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you have pain?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi5j.Description: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because of other reason(s)?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi6.Description: During the past month, how would you rate your sleep quality over all?

psqi7.Description: During the past month, how often have you taken medicine (prescribed or "over the counter") to help you sleep?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi8.Description: During the past month, how often have you had trouble staying awake while driving, eating meals, or engaging in social activity?

Levels.3: Three or more times each week

psqi9.Description: During the past month, how much of a problem has it been for you to keep up enough enthusiasm to get things done?

component2.Description: Sleep latency (Based on sum of psqi2_score and psqi5a)

component5.Description: Sleep disturbances (based on the sum of psqi5b-psqi5j)

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

component7.Description: Daytime dysfunction (Based on sum of psqi8 and psqi9)

global_score.Description: Global score (sum of the seven components)
